name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2
blurb: Help us tread new paths with the second installment of the acclaimed BoUT adventure game series. A sequel is coming...

rewards.reward: No Reward
SUPPORTER - With this you show that you want to support us and our project. You will receive access to our developer forum and a majestic digital wallpaper.
DIGITAL EDITION - You receive the standard digital version of the game (Steam or GoG) and help us improve the game. You of course also receive access to our developer forum.
DIGITAL SPECIAL EDITION - EARLY BIRD - If you're quick, you can get the "Digital Special Edition" for less here.

DIGITAL SPECIAL EDITION - Includes the Standard Edition of the game, plus the digital soundtrack, a digital "Making of"-book and an extended manual (PDF). You also receive access to our developer forum.

DIGITAL BOUT2 & RAVEN PACK \u2013 You receive the \u201eDigital Special Edition\u201c of BoUT2, plus the \u201eDigital Special Edition\u201c of our newest adventure \u201eThe Raven\u201c (=2 games!). You also receive access to our developer forum.

DIGITAL BOUT2 & BATTLE WORLDS PACK \u2013 You receive the \u201eDigital Special Edition\u201c of BoUT2, plus the \u201eDigital Special Edition\u201c of our first Kickstarter game \u201eBattle Worlds: Kronos\u201c (=2 games!). You also receive access to our developer forum.

DIGITAL BOUT PACK - You receive the "Digital Special Edition" of BoUT2, plus the "Digital Special Edition" of BoUT1 and the stand-alone add-on "The Critter Chronicles" (= 3 games!). You also receive access to our developer forum.
LIMITED KICKSTARTER EDITION - EARLY BIRD - If you're quick, you can get the "Limited Kickstarter Edition" for less here.
DIGITAL "THREE IS A PARTY" PACK - You receive 3 copies of the "Digital Special Edition". You and two of your friends also receive access to our developer forum.

LIMITED KICKSTARTER EDITION - Exclusively here and now. The Book of Unwritten Tales 2 in a majestic box, including the printed extended manual, a high-quality printed making-of book, the soundtrack on CD, a BoUT2 mouse pad. You can also download the game and get a Digital Special Edition of BoUT1 and The Critter Chronicles (3 games altogether). And you will be mentioned in the credits of the game! You of course receive access to our developer forum.

COMPLETE KING ART PACK  \u2013 You receive the \u201eDigital Special Edition\u201c of BoUT2, plus the \u201eDigital Special Edition\u201c of BoUT1, The Critter Chronicles, The Raven and Battle Worlds: Kronos (=5 games!). You also receive access to our developer forum.

COMPLETE KING ART & PIRATE PACK  \u2013 You receive the "Digital Special Edition" of BoUT2, plus the "Digital Special Edition" of BoUT1, The Critter Chronicles, The Raven and Battle Worlds: Kronos (= 5 games!). Also your "pirate name" (e.g. Caaarl \u201cSalty Dog\u201d Jones) will be featured as a signature on a petition inside the game. You also receive access to our developer forum.

LIMITED KICKSTARTER EDITION WITH CRITTER PLUSHIE - Exclusively here and now, step right up! The "Limited Kickstarter Edition" PLUS a Critter Plushie to hug and kiss and love forever (Or you can punch it manly against its shoulder and hug it when nobody's looking). Also a "Thank you"-card with original autographs from the developers and an additional Digital Special Edition (4 games all in all). And of course, access to our developer forum.

LIMITED KICKSTARTER EDITION WITH HAND PUPPET - Exclusively here and now. The "Limited Kickstarter Edition" PLUS a Critter hand pupped (bigger than the plushie). Also a "Thank you" card with original autographs from the developers and an additional Digital Special Edition (4 games all in all).
LIMITED SUPERFAN PACK \u2013 EARLY BIRD - If you're quick, you can get the "Superfan Pack" for less here.

SUPERFAN PACK - You receive the "Limited Kickstarter Edition with Critter Puppet". Also a BoUT2 poster with acknowledgement and autographs of the developers. And above all, your name will be in the game! Your offenses and pranks as a student will be recorded in the papers of the Seastone Mage School where they can be read by all players. Plus, access to our developer forum.

FUR-LOVERS DOUBLE CRITTER PACK  - The "Limited Kickstarter Edition with Critter plushie\u201d PLUS a Critter hand puppet (=1 Plushie, 1 Puppet). Also a "Thank you" card with original autographs from the developers and an additional Digital Special Edition (4 games all in all). And of course, access to our developer forum.

DIGITAL "YOU IN THE GAME" PACK  \u2013 You receive the "Complete KING Art & Pirate Pack" PLUS the concept artist of the game will digitally draw you as a BoUT character and the drawing will be featured in the game. (see ART PACK; you will receive a digital hi-res file of the drawing, that you can print out yourself) You also receive access to our developer forum.
LIMITED ART PACK \u2013 EARLY BIRD - If you're quick, you can get the "Art Pack" for less here.

ART PACK - You receive the "Superfan Pack" plus an additional poster (other motif).\r\nFurthermore Marvin Clifford, the concept artist of the game, will digitally draw you as a BoUT character and the drawing will be featured in the game. The drawing will also be sent to you as a high-quality print including a personal dedication from Marvin. Plus, access to our developer forum.

MAKE IT RAIN - You receive 15 copies of the "Digital Special Edition" of BoUT2, 15 copies of the "Digital Special Edition" of BoUT1 and 15 digital copies of "The Critter Chronicles". A lot of gifts to spread the joy of playing BoUT to those you hold dearest! Your benevolence will also earn you a special mentioning in the credits of the game. And access to our developer forum.

MEET THE TEAM - You receive the "Superfan Pack", a BoUT2 bag and you will meet our team at the GamesCom 2014 in Cologne, Germany, have dinner with us and spend a wonderful evening with the team! Food, drinks, admission tickets and hotel costs are on us. You only have to pay for the journey. And access to our developer forum shall be yours.

THE BIG ONE - You receive the "Superfan Pack", a BoUT2 bag and a life-size Critter plush giant. Towering over 100 centimeters high, this pink furry beauty will protect your home from burglars and unexpected Godzilla-attacks and is only available right here, right now. So step right up and get them while they are still ridiculously oversized!

BEHIND THE SCENES - You receive the "Superfan Pack", a BoUT2 bag and you will accompany us for one day of development of BoUT2. You can either visit us in Bremen (Germany), or maybe you are interested in experienceing a session of the voice recordings in Berlin (German) or London (English)? Or maybe you want to watch the orchestra recording session (if it is funded)? You can choose from several options where and when to meet us. Food, drinks, and hotel are on us. You only have to pay for the journey to your chosen destination. And you will most definitely get access to our developer forum.
